attributes.action: limit new-build house price per 100 square metres to 5 times average local salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would be illegal to sell any house built in 2010 or later for more than 5 times the average local salary, which would be published by the government on a town or county basis at the start of each year.

This would encourage innovation in the building industry and ensure a good supply of genuinely affordable housing.
